column5: Are you a future leader of tomorrow's companies and organisations? This programme provides you with the knowledge and skills required for you to become an effective leader in various business contexts and multicultural environments.The programme is tailored to equip students with the knowledge and skills required to become an effective leader in a business world that is increasingly global, culturally dynamic, data driven, socially responsible, and entrepreneurial. Through projects and group work, students fine-tune their planning and collaboration skills, and garner experience in intercultural relations. Support is provided throughout by faculty with substantial experience in management practice and research.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
